participant_1.background:
I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.
I maintained a healthy lifestyle and did well in my classes last year.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald.
I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes.
I like to drive my Honda around, but I have to be careful not to get stung by bees.

i like meat too much.
i am going bald.

content.text: I'm a chef and I love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes!
I have a friend who's a chef! Do you go to culinary school?
No, I actually learned culinary arts from my father!
That's so cool! I love to cook but I'm not very good at it haha
It's a fun hobby! I love coming up with new recipes and trying them out.
Do you have a favorite dish that you like to make?
I love making pasta dishes! I can always come up with new and creative ways to make them.
That sounds delicious! I love pasta!
Me too! I have a few different pasta recipes that I'm really proud of.
Would you share them with me?
